name: Birds Killer
description:
Kill all the dangerous birds you can see !! Take it easy nothing bad again the bird in our world, but in the birdland we need to survive and kill all the feathered animal we can eat, attack or kick you ass . Take care and ready to flight ... euuuuh fight !!

Modes :
- The chicks course : easy mode you have just to kill all the birds and DON'T MISS THEM
- Birds invasion : kill 20 enemies in a row without misses
- Nightmare in the sky : during 90 seconds show you can kill a maximum of birds
- Memorize, select and kill the Birds

Version : 1.1
